system.description: As an action you may select a number of friendly creatures equal to your Charisma modifier within range of your Commanding Presence. Once per turn when an affected creature hits with an attack and has advantage on the attack roll, the attack deals an additional 1d6 damage. You may select a new batch of creatures by spending another action. The effect persists for one minute. Once you have used this ability a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, you canâ€™t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.
